Image.name: mainMenuBackground
Image.Description: The background of the main menu

Image.name: muddyBackground
Image.Desciption: A muddy looking background currently used in the first level

Image.name: titleText
Image.Description: An image containing the title of the game

Image.name: playButton
Image.Description: The button to press to play the game from the main menu

Image.name: player
Image.Description: Image representing the player in game

String.name: mainMenuLayout
String.Description: Filepath to the xml file designating the main menu layout

String.name: level1XML
String.Description: Filepath to the xml file designating the first level

String.name: moduleMapProperties
String.Description: Filepath to the properties file that designates which modules to use to parse an xml level file

Integer.name: gameWidth
Integer.Description: The width of the game window

Integer.name: gameHeight
Integer.Description: The height of the game window
